text: My daughter is a patient, Dr Tan controlled her seizures and manages her condition well.  Yes, she needed tests to diagnose her condition - surely that's what you want in a neurologist, one who works on facts rather than guess work. He was controlled with how he used these test progressing from one to the other as previous results became available. I would recommend.
Dr Tan is friendly and assuring. Going the extra miles to get all the necessary tests done. With his professionalism and experience he is able to advise uwhat is needed and what is not.

Avoid. Doctor will waste your time and look for anyway to make you do useless tests just to overcharge you. Consultation fees are too high and the doctor does not respect confidentiality as he leaves all doors open so that it's completely audible to the other patients in the lobby.
Initial assessment and overall process was unprofessional and rushed.  Did not meet ethical and professional standards. Would not recommend.
he did my wife's emg  on the spot. very caring and kind.
